definition: to fight corruption and advocate probity
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
incorruptible/honest/inexpensive/to investigate (old)/side wall of a traditional Chinese house (old)

sentences.english: Anti-corruption campaign is a major political issue in China, even in the world.
sentences.chinese: 反腐倡廉是中国乃至世界的一项重大政治课题。

sentences.english: At present, there exists problem in executive power.
sentences.chinese: 目前高校在反腐倡廉制度执行力上还存在问题。

sentences.english: It gives us much for thought for today's anti-corruption work.
sentences.chinese: 对今天的反腐倡廉工作有所启迪。

sentences.english: This year the State Council to control commercial bribery as a key of anti-corruption initiate cheap.
sentences.chinese: 今年国务院把治理商业贿赂作为反腐倡廉的重点。

sentences.english: Nowadays increasing attention has been paid to the execution of anti-corruption regulations.
sentences.chinese: 反腐倡廉制度执行力问题日益受到重视和关注。

sentences.english: To enforce the construction of the culture of clean and honest administration is a basic work for fighting against corruption and building clean government.
sentences.chinese: 加强廉政文化建设是反腐倡廉的基础性工作。

sentences.english: Opposing corruption and being in probity is the main content of accelerating the party's construction and the cadres team construction.
sentences.chinese: 反腐倡廉是加强党的建设和干部队伍建设的重要内容。

sentences.english: The keystone of this year's government work is to combat corruption, and build a clean government.
sentences.chinese: 反腐倡廉是中国乃至世界的一项重大政治课题。

sentences.english: The article discussed the fighting against corruptness and promoting integrity are consistent request of the Party and government.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了反腐倡廉是党和政府的一致要求。

sentences.english: Lay more emphasis on combating corruption and advocating integrity.
sentences.chinese: 把反腐倡廉放在更加突出的位置上。

sentences.english: Anti-corruption work must firmly grasp and sound the alarm bell .
sentences.chinese: 反腐倡廉工作一定要常抓不懈，警钟长鸣。

sentences.english: We must treat the problem of anti-corruption and honest and clean government from the high point of the political system reform.
sentences.chinese: 必须从政治体制改革的高度来看待反腐倡廉问题。

definition: to rule according to the law
to fight corruption and forestall moral degeneration
lit. drain away filth and bring in fresh water (idiom); fig. dispel evil and usher in good/eliminate vice and exalt virtue
